snippet: From a Wi-Fi-equipped gondola to smart lift tickets, the Vail experience has been transformed. A veteran skier returns to the resort to see if new also means improved.
abstract: Bill Pennington travel article shares his experience returning after a decade to Vail ski resort in Colorado; small, rugged ski area offering $5 lift tickets when it opened in 1962, Vail is now a luxurious and technologically advanced resort that can attract 1.7 million people to its slopes each season.
lead_paragraph: From a Wi-Fi-equipped gondola to smart lift tickets, the Vail experience has been transformed. A veteran skier returns to the resort to see if new also means improved.
